title: Biting Lip
description:
A mouth with the top teeth biting down on one side of the lower lip.

Used in romantic contexts to express flirtation or arousal. Can be used to express anticipation or excitement in general. Also may be used to express anxiety, pain, worry, or insecurity.
apple_vendor_description: The biting lip emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a striking level of detail, showcasing a single, softly rounded lower lip being gently bitten. Apple's signature glossy finish and subtle, realistic lighting create a sense of subtle tension and allure, hinting at nervousness, anticipation, or flirtation. This emoji is a powerful non-verbal cue in digital communication, conveying a range of emotions from shyness and anxiety to playful desire, all with the characteristic polish and expressiveness of Apple's emoji design.
